# ### Hardware Performance Counter
# Challenge: Software performance analysis and optimization is often limited by the lack of accurate and detailed information about the underlying hardware behavior.
# Solution: Use hardware performance counters to gather data on CPU usage
column5: and other metrics that can help analyze the performance of software applications and hardware systems.
